original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A person has died after sustaining serious injuries in an accident caused by a firework explosion in Thekkawatta in ​​Thambuththegama.
Police said the explosion had taken place when the individual tried to light a firework at a wedding held in the area.
In repeated attempts to light the firework canister, it exploded and caused serious damage to his head.
